errors.title: Oh no, something happened!
list: This version of the game is not compatible with the version of Java you are using. If you are using automatic Java version detection, please contact the developer to correct the error.
Looks like the Java version and the Forge version are not compatible! If you are using automatic Java version detection, please contact the developer to correct the error.
Failed to allocate required amount of memory for Java Try reducing the amount of memory in the launcher settings
It looks like the game's executable JAR file has been lost.  Try restarting the launcher
The launcher cannot find the Java executable file! If you are using automatic Java version detection, please contact the developer to correct the error.
The game configuration or files may be corrupted or created by a newer version of the game.
Try restarting the game again, if that doesnâ€™t help, a complete reinstallation of the game is recommended.

accounts.alreadyExists: This account has already been added

loading.failed: Failed to download content, try again later

elyby.title: Login to Ely.by account
elyby.totpNotify: If you do not know what a TOTP code is or you do not have two-factor authentication enabled, do not fill out this field

newPack.title: New modpack
newPack.input: Enter the name of the assembly
newPack.description: Select the version from the main list on the basis of which you want to build the project.

updatePackM.title: Mod update
updatePackM.disclaimer: Mod updates are now only available in manual mode for testing. Select a build to test.

servers.title: Servers
servers.disclaimer: Launcher developer does not guarantee the quality of the games or the honesty of the servers.
servers.link: How to add my server here?

updater.ready: After restarting the launcher, the update will be installed

game.hideOnStart: Hide the launcher when starting the game

auto.title: Automatically select Java version
auto.description: The version is selected and installed based on the official Mojang manifest

darkMode.title: Color mode
darkMode.description: The launcher will use the selected mode

background.title: The background
background.description: Today is a big castle, or a hellish world?

disableAnimations.title: Disable animations
disableAnimations.description: The time of all animations and transitions is reduced to a minimum

gameDirectory.title: Folder for storing game files
gameDirectory.description: It will store all the game files, Java and others

memory.title: Memory allocation
memory.description: The recommended value for modern versions of the game is from 4 GB.

fullscreen.title: Full screen game mode
fullscreen.description: The flag may not work with some builds

partialSplit.title: Separate version storage
partialSplit.description: Mods, assemblies, resource packs and other user files will be stored in an individual folder with each version (Game folder/home)

fullSplit.title: Full version separation (experimental)
fullSplit.description: ALL files required for each version will be stored in an individual folder (Game folder/home)
fullSplit.description2: Only enable this feature if you have problems running certain versions when you already have a large installed base!
fullSplit.description3: Each version, when the function is enabled, will take up a large amount of space

multiplayerFix.title: Network game fix (experimental)
multiplayerFix.description: The setting is aimed at correcting the error "Network game is not available" when using vanilla versions >= 1.16.5
multiplayerFix.description2: If you encounter any problems with skins and mods, it is recommended to disable this option

lessDataCollection.title: Collect less data
lessDataCollection.description: To provide technical support, with this option enabled, a minimal set of data will be transmitted to the server: your program version and your unique identifier. The full list of data collected when this option is disabled is detailed in our Privacy Policy. Rest assured that we care about your privacy.

success.title: Registration successful!
success.description: Done, you have created an account!

errors.PNG_REQUIRED: Required to select a PNG file
errors.FILE_BITMAP_TOO_BIG: The file is too large or too large
errors.UNKNOWN: An error occurred while performing the action
errors.ALREADY_EXISTS: This user already exists, please select a different nickname

packManager.worldDeleted: The world has been successfully deleted!
